title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Riley, Kelly CFB Shockers, Louis Riddick on Tua, NFL Future, Rodgers/Stafford Mismatch with Mike Silver, Week 13 Bets
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Riley, Kelly CFB Shockers, Louis Riddick on Tua, NFL Future, Rodgers/Stafford Mismatch with Mike Silver, Week 13 Bets
description:
It's the best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast! First, Colin's top takes of the week, including reacting to USC's blockbuster Lincoln Riley hire (3:00), what the outrage over Brian Kelly leaving Notre Dame says about college football fans (13:00), and why he didn't buy into the Matthew Stafford hype (15:00). Then, Monday Night Football analyst and former NFL exec Louis Riddick and Colin discuss if the Seahawks are headed for a total tear down or just a quick reboot (21:00), why Louis thinks Tua deserves much more credit than he's getting (26:00), and if he sees himself leaving the MNF broadcast booth to get back into an NFL front office (30:00). Next, longtime NFL writer Mike Silver and Colin discuss why Brady's Bucs looked different against the Colts (34:00), why Aaron Rodgers sometimes looks "supernatural" (36:00), and if the Niners have re-entered the conversation as a playoff threat (38:00). Finally, The Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin his NFL Week 13 Patriots/Bills (47:00), Chargers/Bengals (48:00), and 49ers/Seahawks (51:00) picks are "sharp" or "square".

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
